cards.title: Frank
setup: At the start of the game, {Frank} enters play “Hired Goon“ side up.
Reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until an{BR}order is revealed and put it into play. Shuffle the other revealed cards into the villain deck.
gameplay: When {Frank} is flipped to this side, set his HP to 13. Then reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until an order is revealed and put it into play. Shuffle the other revealed cards into the villain deck.

At the start of the villain turn, if there are no bosses in play, reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until a boss is revealed and put it into play. Shuffle the other revealed cards into the villain deck.
If this card would be destroyed and there is at least 1 boss in play, flip it instead.
Boss cards with 10 or more HP are indestructible.
When a boss enters play, move all other boss cards to the villain trash (even if indestructible).
flippedGameplay: When {Frank} is flipped to this side, shuffle all non-indestructible order cards in play into the villain deck.
Boss cards with 10 or more HP are indestructible.
If there are no boss cards in play, the heroes win.
At the start of the villain turn, {Frank} flips.
cards.flippedAdvanced: When a boss is dealt damage by a hero target, they deal the source of that damage 2 melee damage.
cards.challengeText: Replace the last paragraph of text on {Frank}'s “Hired Goon“ side with: When a boss enters play, if there are 2 or more other bosses in play, move 1 of the other bosses to the villain trash (even if indestructible).

cards.title: The Rest of the Gang
body: When {Frank} deals damage to a hero target, this card deals 1 melee damage to all other hero targets.
cards.flavorText: Martina. Jin. Elle.{BR}They'll work for anyone,{BR}no questions asked.

cards.title: Themed Weapon
body: Increase damage dealt by henches by 1.
After a boss deals damage, change all damage dealt by henches to that type until the next time a boss deals damage or this card leaves play.

flavorQuotes.text: What's this thing do, boss?

cards.title: Assigned Outfit
body: Reduce damage to henches by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: We gotta look this stupid, we should{br}get a bigger cut.

cards.title: Lucky Punch
body: {Frank} deals the hero with the lowest HP {H + 1} melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Can't believe a two-bit chump{BR}turned me into his personal punching bag.

cards.title: The Big Job
body: Reveal the top {H} cards of the villain deck. Put any hench, device, or order cards revealed into play. Shuffle the other revealed cards into the villain deck.
Play the top card of the villain deck.

flavorQuotes.text: What's the plan, boss?

cards.title: Cover My Back!
body: When a boss is dealt damage, {Frank} deals the source of that damage 1 melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: [b]Aah![/b] Somebody stop her!

cards.title: Get Them!
body: At the end of the Villain turn, {Frank} deals the hero target with the highest HP 1 melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Bruise them purple! But take care{BR}lest you beat them black and blue instead!

cards.title: Follow My Lead!
body: Whenever a boss deals damage to a target, {Frank} deals that target 1 melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Once I've knocked these losers{BR}off-balance, finish them off so everyone{BR}can see how [b]pathetic[/b] they really are.

cards.title: The Devious Divisor
body: Villain targets are immune to irreducible damage.
Whenever a hero uses a power, this card deals them X irreducible energy damage, where X is the sum of the numerals in that power's text.

flavorQuotes.text: You're a [b]prime[/b]{BR}candidate for my [b]malefactors[/b]. They're a closeknit bunch. Practically [b]indivisible[/b].
[b]Ten-four[/b], boss.

cards.title: Thraiw
body: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the {H - 2} hero targets with the highest HP 3 damage each. Whenever a target is dealt damage this way, reduce all damage it deals by 1 until the start of the villain turn.
At the start of the villain turn, reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until a device is revealed and put it into play. Shuffle the other revealed cards into the villain deck.

flavorQuotes.text: Since [b]she[/b] uses allies, I'll need{br}some too. And since my previous associates disintregrated, you'll have to do.
Uh . . . Okay, boss.

cards.title: The Regional Manager
body: At the end of the villain turn, reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until an order is revealed and put it into play. Shuffle the other revealed cards into the villain deck.
At the start of the villain turn, search the villain trash for a card named “the Rest of the Gang“. Put it into play.

flavorQuotes.text: A man like you can go far in our organization, Frank.

cards.flavorReference: The Regional Manager,{BR}The Strike of Midnight #194

cards.title: Mind Reaper
body: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals each other non-Device target 1 psychic damage. Then, any target which took damage this way deals the hero target with the highest HP 1 melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: I have no need for a 'henchman',{BR}but I can always use a new [b]host[/b]!

cards.title: The Heel
body: At the end of the villain turn, reveal the top card of the villain deck. If it is an order, hench, or device, put it into play. Otherwise, shuffle the revealed card into the villain deck.
At the start of the villain turn, if any hero dealt damage during the previous round (while this card was in play), this card deals the hero target with the lowest HP {H} projectile damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Join the Stilletos? With{BR}your experience, you're a shoe-in.
If the shoe fits, boss.

cards.title: The Baroness
body: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the hero target with the highest HP 2 melee damage and 2 infernal damage.
When damage dealt by a villain target is reduced to 0 or prevented, destroy a hero ongoing or equipment card.
Increase radiant damage dealt to this card by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: And you've brought friends. How{BR}lovely! Vell, I've brought friends of my own.

cards.flavorReference: The Baroness, Bastion City: A Spider{BR}Never Blinks #71

cards.title: Rhyme Scheme
body: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the 2 hero targets with the highest HP X sonic damage each, where X = 1 plus the number of order cards in play.
If there are two or more copies of the same villain card in play, they are indestructible.

flavorQuotes.text: 'Twill be villain's win,{BR}and heroes' loss.{BR}Now get them, Frank!
You got it, boss.

cards.title: Lootcase
body: When this card enters play, search the villain deck for a “Get Them!“ and put it into play. Shuffle the villain deck.
When a hero is dealt damage by a hench, reveal cards from the top of their deck until an equipment card is revealed. Move it under this card. Shuffle the rest back into the deck.
When this card is destroyed or moved, move cards under it to the bottom of their decks.

flavorQuotes.text: I abhor violence, personally.{BR}But fortunately, my friends here are not so discriminating.

cards.title: Breakaway
body: When this card enters play, set its HP to 40. Then search the villain deck for a “Get Them!“ and put it into play. Shuffle the villain deck.
When a hero is dealt damage by a hench, this card regains {H} HP.
At the start of the villain turn, if this card has 50 or more HP, the heroes lose.

flavorQuotes.text: I'll make my move at 3:45. Keep{BR}them off my tail for fifteen minutes and this will be the best rate you've ever earned.

cards.title: Zurkalla
body: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the non-villain target with the second highest HP {H} melee damage.
The first time each turn that {Frank} deals damage to a hero, this card deals that hero {H - 1} melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: This time, I have recruited{BR}dimensional natives so that we may engage in . . . [b]the greatest rumble this plane has{BR}ever seen![/b]
